answerText: Eddington limit [or Eddington luminosity][10] The Chandrasekhar limit gives the maximum stable mass of this type of star based on its electron degeneracy pressure.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 3 | 5 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer the following about some limits in astronomy, for 10 points each: [10] This limit predicts the maximum luminosity a stellar object can have given the outward radiation and inward gravitational forces.
